actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A joint resolution calling upon the Department of Transportation to investigate and identify the possible causes of the increasing number of mid-air collisions and near misses.

summary.text: Directs the Department of Transportation to report to Congress, within 60 days of enactment of this resolution, on ways to improve air traffic safety.

titles.title: A joint resolution calling upon the Department of Transportation to investigate and identify the possible causes of the increasing number of mid-air collisions and near misses.
